ComicInfo.Summary:
Ryu encounters a ghost from his past, while Guile, Cammy, Alex, and Chun-li struggle to survive the onslaught of Vega's new minions! Plus, the ladies of S.I.N come face to face as Crimson Viper battles Juri in a 4-page bonus story!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Regular Story Cover | Genzoman | 1 | B | Ultra Jam Puzzle Cover B (4 of 12) | Jeffrey Cruz | 2 | C | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Homage Cover C | Gisele Lagace | 3 | D | 1:20 Retailer Incentive Street Fighter V Cover D | Kandoken | 4 | Notes:
Cover B is part four of a twelve part connecting cover image made up of all the Ultra Jam Puzzle covers for issues #1-12. The 1:10 Retailer Incentive Homage Cover C is a homage of the cover of Archie: Love Showdown #1.
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/street-fighter-unlimited-4-a-second-chance/4000-517878/
ComicInfo.Title: A Second Chance
